CodeList.Name: Contact Case Investigation Contact Type

Description.TranslatedText: Terminology relevant to the identification and clinical investigation of disease contacts.

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A way of contracting a disease through everyday interactions (nonsexual) with an infected person.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CONTACT WITH EXPOSURE DURING MEDICAL PROCEDURE
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A way of contracting a disease by interacting with an individual that has been exposed to the disease while undergoing a medical procedure.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Contact With Exposure During Medical Procedure

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: CONTACT WITH EXPOSURE IN CROWD SETTING
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A way of contracting a disease by physically associating with an infected group of individuals.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: Contact With Exposure In Crowd Setting

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: A way of contracting a disease by interacting with an individual that is considered at high risk for having the disease.
A way of contracting a disease through interactions with an infected person in the same residence.

CodeList.nciodm:PreferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Contact Case Investigation Contact Type Terminology
